description:
NegativeScreen is a Windows application that allows you to invert your screen's colors.
Appart from accessibility matters, this software is especially useful when you are surfing on the internet in a dark room, and the screen is dazzling you.

The name "NegativeScreen" stuck, but you can now use it to apply any color effect that can be modeled as a color transformation matrix.
summary: NegativeScreen is a Windows application allowing you to invert your screen colors.
author: Melvyn Laïly
